title: Giggle cake
ingredients: ['340g (12oz) mixed fruit', '120g (4 1/4oz) margarine', '170g (6oz) dark brown soft sugar', '225g (8oz) self-raising flour', '1 pinch salt', '2 eggs, beaten', '225g (8oz) canned crushed pineapple, drained', '120g (4 1/4oz) glace cherries, halved', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
